name: RelaxingMusicforDogs
0:
”Alexa, open Relaxing Music Dogs”
”Alexa, start Relaxing Music Dogs”
”Alexa, launch Relaxing Music Dogs”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: relaxing music dogs
Developer Terms of Use
des:
"Relaxing Music for Dogs" is a perfect skill to relax your dog and help him doze off, it will be even more effective for dog puppies.
Do you want your dog to relax and enjoy a moment of calm?
Let him listen to this soothing music and watch how he falls asleep.
Don't forget to also offer him caresses so that the experience is complete and can enjoy a moment of well-being with his best friend!

To open the skill just say:

"Alexa, start relaxing dog music"
"Alexa, play relaxing dogs music"
"Alexa, open relaxing music"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
